long: Meaning: properly, a "standing", i.e. a "spot"; but used widely of a locality (general or specific); also (figuratively) of a "condition" (of body or mind).  Usage: country, × home, × open, place, room, space, × whither(-soever).  Source: or "מָקֹם"; also (feminine) "מְקוֹמָה"; or "מְקֹמָה"; from "H6965";
